paper_abstract: We present theoretical foundations about error estimations of the global Krylov subspace techniques for multiple-inputs multiple-outputs (MIMO) Interconnect reductions. Analytical relationships between Lyapunov functions of the original interconnect network and those of the reduced system generated by the global Arnoldi algorithm will be developed. Under this framework, a new moment matching reduced network is proposed. Also, we will show that the reduced system can be expressed as the original network with some additive perturbations.
paper_title: Lyapunov-based error estimations of MIMO interconnect reductions by using the global Arnoldi algorithm
